Florence Seriki MFR (Ọgọst 16, 1963 - 3 Maachị 2017) bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Omatek Ventures Plc
, ụlọ ọrụ ICT mbụ nke Naijiria na Africa iji kpokọta ma rụpụta kọmpụta na akụkụ kọmputa dị ka okwu kọmputa, ọkà okwu, kiiboodu, òké
A mụrụ Seriki na Lagos mana o si Delta State
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Reagan Memorial Baptist Secondary School, Sabo, Yaba n'etiti 1975 na 1980 wee gaa na Federal School of Science, Lagos maka ọkwa A
Ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na mahadum Ife (nke bụzi Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife )
Na 1993, n'oge ngosi CTO (nke ngalaba azụmahịa nke American Embassy na Nigeria haziri), Seriki wepụtara Omatek brand of Computers nke bụ n'ezie mbọ mbụ ụdịrị ya na Nigeria

N'afọ 2003, ọ ghọrọ onye Afrịka mbụ mepụtara akpa kọmputa, igwe okwu, bọọdụ na mouse nke si na completely knocked down(CKD) ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara kọmputa Omatek, akwụkwọ ndetu na sava na ihe niile mejupụtara ya na Nigeria
Ihe nrite ndị e meriri gụnyere:
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị nwere ụmụ atọ, otu nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Seriki nwụrụ na Lagos University Teaching Hospital (LUTH) na Friday 3 March 2017
Ihe gburu ya bụ cancer  nke pancreas.
